definition: A segment of time that is commonly used to refer to a specific period or interval, often used in the context of dividing time into smaller units for various purposes.

examples.german: Der Zeitabschnitt zwischen den beiden Weltkriegen
examples.english: The time period between the two World Wars

examples.german: Ein Zeitabschnitt von Montag bis Freitag
examples.english: A time period from Monday to Friday
The time period of the Renaissance
